TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SoapMethodAttribute extends System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class SoapMethodAttribute Inherits SoapAttribute

summary.span: 自定义方法的 SOAP 生成和处理。

span.span: Customizes SOAP generation and processing for a method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目标对象的属性是可远程调用的方法。The target objects for the attribute are methods that can be remotely invoked. 应用自定义 SOAP 生成和处理。Apply the to customize SOAP generation and processing. 此属性的属性允许程序员也要自定义的 SOAPAction HTTP 标头字段，以指示 SOAP HTTP 请求的意图。Properties of this attribute allow the programmer to customize the SOAPAction HTTP header field to indicate the intent of the SOAP HTTP request. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用中的成员类自定义 SOAP 生成和处理的方法。The following code example shows how to use the members in the class to customize SOAP generation and processing for a method. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapMethodAttribute#100](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapMethodAttribute/CPP/demo.cpp#100)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapMethodAttribute#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapMethodAttribute/CS/demo.cs#100)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于对目标方法的方法响应的 XML 元素名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the XML element name to use for the method response to the target method.

value.span: 用于对目标方法的方法响应的 XML 元素名称。

span.span: The XML element name to use for the method response to the target method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认值是"响应"追加到方法的名称的字符串。The default value of this property is the string "Response" appended to the name of the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 获取或设置与用此方法发送的 HTTP 请求一起使用的 SOAPAction 标头字段。

span.span: Gets or sets the SOAPAction header field used with HTTP requests sent with this method.
This property is currently not implemented.

value.span: 与用此方法发送的 HTTP 请求一起使用的 SOAPAction 标头字段。

span.span: The SOAPAction header field used with HTTP requests sent with this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前未实现此属性。This property is currently not implemented. SOAPAction HTTP 请求标头字段指示 SOAP HTTP 请求的意图。The SOAPAction HTTP request header field indicates the intent of the SOAP HTTP request. SOAPAction 字段的详细信息，请参阅 www.w3.org/tr/soap/#_Toc478383528。For more information on the SOAPAction field, see www.w3.org/tr/soap/#_Toc478383528. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当前特性的目标是否序列化为 XML 特性而非 XML 字段。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the target of the current attribute will be serialized as an XML attribute instead of an XML field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性不能设置上属性。The property cannot be set on the attribute.

span.span: An attempt was made to set the current property.

summary.span: 获取或设置在序列化目标方法的远程方法调用期间使用的 XML 命名空间。

span.span: Gets or sets the XML namespace that is used during serialization of remote method calls of the target method.

value.span: 在序列化目标方法的远程方法调用期间使用的 XML 命名空间。

span.span: The XML namespace that is used during serialization of remote method calls of the target method.
